general_advisory: Due to forecast of rainfall, the matured crops which are at physiological stage are to be harvested and shifted to a safer place. Also survey for insect pest attack and steps may be taken accordingly.

advisory: Due to weather, the leaf folder infestation may occur, to manage this pest spray Acephate 75% SP @ 1-2 ml/lt.
To manage Pod borer in green gram and black gram crop spray Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG @ 80-gram/acre or Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% SC @80-ml/acre or Profenophos 50% EC @ 400-ml/acre.
When 85% of the fingers turn yellow, go for harvesting.
Present weather condition is suitable for infestation of sigatoka in banana. Go for application of Propiconazole @1ml/lt for 2-3 times in 25 days interval.

Nursery bed preparation: Prepare nursery beds, each measuring 3m length, 1m breadth and 15-20 cm height. Apply 15-30 kg well-decomposed FYM and 150 grams of chlorpyriphos dust to each nursery bed seven days prior to sowing. In case of improved varieties, 200-250 grams of seed is required for one acre area of cultivation and 100-150 grams of seed is required in case of hybrids.
There are chances of infestation of Downy Mildew disease in cucurbit vegetables after the heavy rainfall. To manage Downy Mildew disease in cucurbits, spray Copper Hydroxide 77% WP @ 3 g/litre.
To manage the rhizome rot, go for Soil drenching with 1.25 g Metalaxyl-Mancozeb + 2 ml Quinalphos + 1g Plantomyc in per liter of water.
There may be EUS disease in fishes, to cure apply Cifax@ 400ml/acre of pond area.
